title: Frank Hannon - Six String Soldiers
description:
Built on the bedrock of contagious riffs, tight grooves, and raunchy guitar leads, Frank Hannonâ€™s solo record upholds all the familiar hard rock truisms with commendable conviction.

Few virtuosos of Hannonâ€™s calibre are interested these days in sustaining the canonical values of straightforward hard rock with such earnestness. But you can tell he is genuinely enjoying himself, putting demonstrations of his chops on the backburner and getting a kick out of the grooves, the riffs, and the sprawling melodies of traditional hard rock.

A dash of blues such as on standout â€œIâ€™m Aliveâ€ adds an occasional extra dimension to this release, as do parts by guest guitarists Pat Travers, Dave Meniketti, Rick Derringer, and Dicky Betts. But it still remains a conventional, safe, time-tested affair â€“ effective in upholding the standard of great rock and roll!

Genre: Hard Rock, Blues-rock
